entry.title: Finally, I have a blog site
entry.summary: I chose Docusaurus to implement my blog site, it's a great tool
entry.content:
Welcome to gotrongluan's blog. This blog is created with Docusaurus 2

Today is the 2nd day of the lunar new year. I decided to start my own blog. My goal is to blog to remember what I've learned, as well as a place to demonstrate my abilities.

What I learned and the knowledge from my own perspective will be written in this blog site. I promise that everything I write is from my own words and thoughts, not copied from any source.

Happy Lunar New Year 2023!
